snippet.title: Official Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - "The Giant" Zombies Bonus Map Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
“The Giant” Bonus Map picks up the Zombies story where Origins left off. Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic "Der Riese" Zombies map with Dempsey, Nikolai, Takeo and Richtofen. Set in a World War II-era research facility, complete with the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine, Teleporters, and Hellhounds.

"The Giant" is a bonus map included with the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Collector's Editions. Pre-order and secure your copy now:
https://www.callofduty.com/blackops3/ce

Season Pass and “The Giant” Zombies bonus map are not available on PS3 or Xbox 360. Call of Duty®: Black Ops III game required to use this content.

Follow us for the latest intel:
Web: http://www.callofduty.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CallofDuty and https://www.facebook.com/Treyarch
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CallofDuty and https://twitter.com/Treyarch
Instagram: https://instagram.com/callofduty and https://instagram.com/treyarch
Snapchat: callofduty
